body: @Coomer Nationalist LMAO. imagine actually wanting to pay an MTLer...
I mean if you're gonna pay me then hell yeah lol
@greengrasstree https://nhentai.net/g/328561/ can you translate some of his other works? I can pay if you're interested.

Notice C-ori still being totally calm when Hidemi catches them at the end, even as she's being thrown through a wall; I can see her sending the video to the rest of Hidemi's gang. As for Hidemi, maybe she'd want to break up with Honda for filming her without her consent, but I wouldn't be surprised if she was pregnant from the raw sex they had, so she'd stay with him. So they have a kid, get married and live happily ever after, other than the fact their sex tape would continue to spread and eventually end up online.

Interesting things about the dialogue: 1) The names of Hidemi's subordinates line up with the letters they're assigned (A-na, B-ko and C-ori). 2) Best of all, the stuff Hidemi tells her boyfriend when she's helping him practice his batting lines up with what she tells him when they're having sex in the video. This whole comic is a metaphor, likening batting to sex. Even if your swings don't hit any balls, you can still hit your girlfriend's pussy.
